channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overgrown hedge causing cars to drift to other side of the road, 9th April
item.description:
There is a tight corner when coming into Gotherington along Gotherington Lane on to Cleeve road. There is a hedge that needs cutting back as when 2 vehicles are using the road at the same time, travelling in opposite directions, it is very narrow. I have had a few problems here in the last month where vehicles coming in the opposite direction have once hit my wing mirror and another time caused me to drive so close to the hedge that my vehicle has become very scratched. Maybe if the hedge was cut back, it would be a bit easier for drivers to keep to the correct side of the road without drifting over. It also seems dangerous around school pick up times when just past this corner, cars seem to pull out infront causing near misses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3,4, Gotherington Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: The drain is banging very loudly! Please please please can this be fixed!, 9th April
item.description:
The drain cover bangs extremely loudly when traffic drives over it. This was ‘fixed’ last October but was done badly and now bangs again and is worse than it was before.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Prestbury Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 9th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway abrupt level difference 400x300x30mm tarmac patch required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 9th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please lift an relay x1 rocking 600x600x20mm best out of hours number 1 (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 9th April
item.description:
Speed sign in Ward Road is incorrectly displaying 20MPH when the road is 30MPH. Can this be changed please?
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)
